name: Yet Another Repairing Day 十三號修理店
name_original: Yet Another Repairing Day 十三號修理店
description:
GGJ 2020 作品 

在《十三號修理店》里，你将扮演一名“专业”的维修技工，并靠经营一家修理小铺维持家里的生计。每天你都为这个世界上千奇百怪的人修理着各种奇葩的物品，而突然有一天，你从一个神秘顾客送来维修的物品里发现了一条奇怪的线索......

Made In GGJ 2020

In "Yet Another Repairing Day", you will play the role of a "professional" repair technician and maintain your family's livelihood by running a repair shop. Every day you repair all kinds of weird items for the strange people in this world, and suddenly one day, you find a strange clue in the items sent by a mysterious customer for repair...
